xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:title: XCCDF Benchmark That References the Validation Content for the uname_test
xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:description: This XCCDF Benchmark references the OVAL Definitions in the validation content for the uname_test.

xccdf:metadata.dc:contributor: National Institute of Standards and Technology
xccdf:metadata.dc:publisher: National Institute of Standards and Technology
xccdf:metadata.dc:creator: National Institute of Standards and Technology

xccdf:Profile.xccdf:title: XCCDF Profile That References the Validation Content for the uname_test
xccdf:Profile.xccdf:description: This Profile allows for the tailoring of the validation content for the uname_test.

metadata.title: Test the machine_class entity with the equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the machine_class entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the machine_class equals x86_64.

metadata.description: Make sure the machine_class entity properly supports the not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the machine_class is not equal to x86_64.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the machine_class is case insensitive not equal to x86_64.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the machine_class matches the regular expression [a-z]86_64.

uname_test.comment: Test to see that the machine_class equals x86_64.
Test to see that the machine_class is not equal to x86_64.
Test to see that the machine_class case insensitive equals X86_64.
Test to see that the machine_class is case insensitive not equal to x86_64.
Test to see that the machine_class matches the regular expression [a-z]86_64.
Test to see that the machine_class equals sun4u.
Test to see that the machine_class is not equal to sun4u.
Test to see that the machine_class case insensitive equals sun4u.
Test to see that the machine_class is case insensitive not equal to sun4u.
Test to see that the machine_class matches the regular expression sun[a-z]u.
Test to see that the node_name equals localhost.localdomain.
Test to see that the node_name is not equal to localhost.localdomain.
Test to see that the node_name case insensitive equals LoCaLhOsT.lOcAlDoMaIn.
Test to see that the node_name is case insensitive not equal to lOcAlhOst.lOcAldOmAIn.
Test to see that the node_name matches the regular expression [\d]ocalhost\.[\d]ocaldomain.
Test to see that the node_name equals dune.
Test to see that the node_name is not equal to dune.
Test to see that the node_name case insensitive equals DuNe.
Test to see that the node_name is case insensitive not equal to dUnE.
Test to see that the node_name matches the regular expression [Dd]une.
Test to see that the os_name equals Linux.
Test to see that the os_name is not equal to Linux.
Test to see that the os_name case insensitive equals linux.
Test to see that the os_name is case insensitive not equal to LinuX.
Test to see that the os_name matches the regular expression ^L[\w]+x$.
Test to see that the os_name equals Solaris.
Test to see that the os_name is not equal to Solaris.
Test to see that the os_name case insensitive equals Solaris.
Test to see that the os_name is case insensitive not equal to Solaris.
Test to see that the os_name matches the regular expression Solaris.
Test to see that the os_release equals 2.6.18-238.12.1.el5.
Test to see that the os_release is not equal to 2.6.18-238.12.1.el5.
Test to see that the os_release case insensitive equals 2.6.18-238.12.1.eL5.
Test to see that the os_release is case insensitive not equal to 2.6.18-238.12.1.eL5.
Test to see that the os_release matches the regular expression 2.6.18-238\.[\w]+.
Test to see that the os_release equals 5.1.
Test to see that the os_release is not equal to 5.1.
Test to see that the os_release case insensitive equals 5.1.
Test to see that the os_release is case insensitive not equal to 5.1.
Test to see that the os_release matches the regular expression ^[a-z]$.
Test to see that the os_version equals #1 SMP Sat May 7 20:18:50 EDT 2011.
Test to see that the os_version is not equal to #1 SMP Sat May 7 20:18:50 EDT 2011.
Test to see that the os_version case insensitive equals #1 SMP Sat MAY 7 20:18:50 EdT 2011.
Test to see that the os_version is case insensitive not equal to #1 SMP Sat MAY 7 20:18:50 EdT 2011.
